code: import axios from"axios";export var createComment=function createComment(comment){return axios.post("api/comments/",comment);};export var getAllComments=function getAllComments(){return axios.get("/api/comments");};export var getPostComments=function getPostComments(postId){return axios.get("/api/comments/post/".concat(postId));};export var getComment=function getComment(commentId){return axios.get("/api/comments/".concat(commentId));};export var deleteComment=function deleteComment(commentId){return axios.delete("/api/comments/".concat(commentId));};
